ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger bitter orange aperitif (such as AperolÂ®)
des: "I discovered this gloriously refreshing drink in Berlin on a tour of Eastern European cities. Brings back wonderful memories. Serve in a wine glass. Pretty and tasty!"
ins: Fill a wine glass with ice cubes; pour in Prosecco and carbonated water. Top cocktail with bitter orange aperitif. Garnish with orange slice.
